root.name: Winning Post
root.description: This article is for the Japan-only first title of the Winning Post series. For the North American second title, see Winning Post.OverviewWinning Post is a Japan-only release that marked the beginning of Koei's long running Winning Post series. While initially only released for the X6800, it was later released on the Sega Mega-CD, 3DO, NEC PC-9801, and Game Boy Advance.
